```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
library(plotly)
library(readr)

```

# Import data

```{r}
iris_clean <- read_csv("iris_clean.csv")
```


# Iris Exploration

```{r}
plot <- iris_clean %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = petal_width, y = petal_length, color = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_viridis_d() +
  theme_light()
  
ggplotly(plot)

```
